languages.text: {n}Он корчится, обхватывая себя руками, и заходится влажным кашлем, на губах выступает кровь.{/n} "... простите, Ваша Светлость. Если бы я только знал, что это вы. Глаза подвели меня! Теперь у нас мало времени, но, клянусь, я расскажу вам все!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Он скорчивается, обхватывая себя руками, и заходится влажным кашлем, на губах выступает кровь.{/n} "... простите, Ваше Благородие. Если бы я только знал, что это вы. Глаза подвели меня! Теперь у нас мало времени, но, клянусь, я расскажу вам все".

languages.text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"
languages.original_text: {n}Он корчится, обхватывая себя руками, и заходится влажным кашлем, на губах выступает кровь.{/n} "... простите, Ваша Светлость. Если бы я только знал, что это вы. Глаза подвели меня! Теперь у нас мало времени, но, клянусь, я расскажу вам все!"

traits.locale_text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

{n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

{n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

{n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

languages.text: {n}男はかがみ込むと腕で自身を包みこむ。身体をむしばむ咳により、唇が血で湿っている。{/n}「…お許しください、陛下。陛下だと分かってさえいれば良かったのですが。自分の目に騙されるとは！残された時間はわずかですが、全てをお話しすると誓います！」
languages.original_text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男はかがみ込むと腕で自身を包みこむ。身体をむしばむ咳により、唇が血で湿っている。{/n}「…お許しください、陛下。陛下だと分かってさえいれば良かったのですが。自分の目に騙されるとは！残された時間はわずかですが、全てをお話しすると誓います！」

languages.text: {n}他双腿一软，蜷缩起来，不住地咳嗽着，鲜血流到了嘴唇上。{/n}“……请原谅，大人，如果我早知道是您就好了。我的眼睛欺骗了我！我恐怕时间不多了，但我发誓，我愿意对您言无不尽！”
languages.original_text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他双腿一软，蜷缩起来，不住地咳嗽着，鲜血流到了嘴唇上。{/n}“……请原谅，大人，如果我早知道是您就好了。我的眼睛欺骗了我！我恐怕时间不多了，但我发誓，我愿意对您言无不尽！”

languages.text: {n}Se dobla de dolor, se cubre con los brazos y sufre un ataque de tos que deja sus labios manchados de sangre.{/n} «... Discúlpeme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ojalá hubiera sabido que era usted. ¡Mis ojos me han fallado! Tenemos poco tiempo, ¡pero juro que se lo contaré todo!».
languages.original_text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Se dobla de dolor, se cubre con los brazos y sufre un ataque de tos que deja sus labios manchados de sangre.{/n} «... Discúlpeme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ojalá hubiera sabido que era usted. ¡Mis ojos me han fallado! Tenemos poco tiempo, ¡pero juro que se lo contaré todo!».

languages.text: {n}Er krümmt sich zusammen, umschließt seinen Körper mit den Armen und wird von einem Hustenanfall geschüttelt, an dessen Ende seine voller Blut sind.{/n} "... Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hätte ich nur gewusst, dass Ihr es seid. Meine Augen haben mich getrogen! Ich habe nur noch wenig Zeit, aber ich schwöre, ich werde Euch alles sagen!"
languages.original_text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er krümmt sich zusammen, umschließt seinen Körper mit den Armen und wird von einem Hustenanfall geschüttelt, an dessen Ende seine voller Blut sind.{/n} "... Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Hätte ich nur gewusst, dass Ihr es seid. Meine Augen haben mich getrogen! Ich habe nur noch wenig Zeit, aber ich schwöre, ich werde Euch alles sagen!"

languages.text: {n}Il se plie en deux, les bras serrés autour du corps, et se met à tousser en crachant du sang.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. Si j'avais su que c'était vous... Mes yeux m'ont trahi ! Il ne me reste que peu de temps, mais je vais tout vous raconter. »
languages.original_text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se plie en deux, les bras serrés autour du corps, et se met à tousser en crachant du sang.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. Si j'avais su que c'était vous... Mes yeux m'ont trahi ! Il ne me reste que peu de temps, mais je vais tout vous raconter. »

languages.text: {n}Adam iki büklüm oluyor, kollarını kendi etrafına sarmalıyor ve dudakları kanla ıslanana kadar öksürük nöbetine giriyor.{/n} "Affedin beni {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Keşke gelenin siz olduğunuzu bilseydim. Gözlerim beni yarı yolda bıraktı! Fazla zamanımız yok ama yemin ederim size her şeyi anlatacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}He doubles up, hugging himself, and is wracked by coughing that leaves his lips wet with blood.{/n} "...Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If only I'd known it was you. My eyes deceived me! We have little time now, but I swear I'll tell you everything!"

Keşke gelenin siz olduğunuzu bilseydim. Gözlerim beni yarı yolda bıraktı! Fazla zamanımız yok ama yemin ederim size her şeyi anlatacağım!"
